item.title: Book Your Appointment with COMM+D Online!
item.description: Are you working on a writing assignment, oral presentation, or visual design project? Whether you’re at the beginning brainstorming stages or finishing up your final revisions, the Center for Global Communication+Design (Comm+D) can help, so be sure to schedule an appointment with a member of the Center’s trained staff!

item.title: 2025 Annual Utility Shutdown
item.description:
All members of the campus community should note the dates for the 2025 Annual Utility Shutdown for Assessment and Repair. Steam outages are scheduled to take place from May 10th -17th. Electrical outages, which are necessary to exercise distribution feeders and test the campus’ automatic power transfer switches, is scheduled for May 12th-15th. Please check the spreadsheet links on the Administration Division’s website for specific outage dates and times for each building.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
